post.text: Hillary ha luchado por los niños y las familias a lo largo de su carrera—esa es la experiencia que ella llevará a la Casa Blanca.

comment.author: Deanna
comment.text: BULLCRAP.....all the while supporting her socialist hard core backgnd just listen to her own words, has one theme for many fools, the other for her back door cronies, you like open borders. thousands more refugees, higher taxes, the list of social programs is endless, think before you get caught in the foolish gender issue..!

replies.author: Brandon
replies.text: funny you call him a pig. But the fly didn't seek him out. It landed on the pile of pig pooh , more than once.

replies.author: Taylor
replies.text: Lisa Wolfe <<< Please do not refer to Hillary's husband, Bill, as a PIG & a SEXUAL PREDATOR on her FB page. Gosh....have some decency Lisa.

replies.author: Deanna
replies.text: Lisa, I believe your speaking about Billy boy..?? one person..?? your not very social then,need to get out more, meet real people....?? but then, you may be one of the deceased voters....??

replies.author: Constance
replies.text: Donald Trump psychologically unstable and not in control of his emotions. I am afraid what will happen when Trump interacts with the maniac in North Korea.pray for our nation and the world if he is elected.
